title: A Wall of Eulogies
description: Callum is an average teenage boy growing up in the modern world until one day his whole world collapses. A Wall of Eulogies tells the heart-wrenching story of a young person caught on the wrong side of life. Disconnected from his family, Callum attempts to deal with his new life in the best way that he can. But when life throws his family another curveball, Callum has a choice. He must choose between the past and the future; the crushing pain and the chance of hope. Join Callum on his inspiring journey of self-discovery as he rekindles his inner fire and learns the true meaning of love.
author: K.L.  Taylor
